titleStmt.title: The rosarie of our Ladie. Otherwise called our Ladies psalter With other godlie exercises mentioned in the preface.
titleStmt.author: De Vos, M., artist.
Collaert, Jan, ca. 1540-1628, engraver.
Worthington, Thomas, 1549-1627.

notesStmt.note: Editor's preface signed: T.VV. p., i.e. Thomas Worthington, priest.
The title page is engraved; at foot: Cum gratia et priuilegio.
Many of the engraved illustrations are signed: M. de Vos inuent. Ioan Collaert sculp.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
